title: Coinbase ends GiveCrypto initiative, prompting crypto charity scrutiny
description: Coinbase is winding down the GiveCrypto initiative, citing its failure to create a lasting impact. In a blog post on Dec. 15, Coinbase said its non-profit initiative founded by the exchange’s head Brian Armstrong was “unable to create lasting change…

title: Solana-based ecosystem Aurory loses 80% of pool’s liquidity
description: Fraudsters managed to break through the security system of the gaming ecosystem based on Solana-Aurory. As a result of the exploit, the platform lost 80% of the liquidity of the AURY-USDC pool of the decentralized crypto exchange Carmelot. The exploit…

title: FTX proposes plan to end bankruptcy
description: FTX Trading Ltd. Introduced a new proposal to return billions of dollars to customers and creditors. FTX has filed an amended plan of reorganization that will value assets at the rate at the time of the bankruptcy filing—November 11, 2022.…

title: BTC Fell Over the Weekend, Could This Be a Slight Bump Before Its Surge?
description:
With the end of another non-holiday weekend, Santiment, the market on-chain analytical platform, took to Twitter to report the slight downfall witnessed by Bitcoin and several other altcoins. Despite the market being dipped in red, the platform further emphasized that ICP, along with INJ, STX, and BONK, have experienced a surge.  The social volumes of […]

The post BTC Fell Over the Weekend, Could This Be a Slight Bump Before Its Surge? appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Breaking: ETH Drops to a Key Support; Triggers 11.2K Transfer to Binance
description:
The on-chain tracking platform Lookonchain revealed in an X post this morning that $24.3 million worth of Ether (ETH) was sent to Binance earlier today. According to the post, Galaxy Digital was the entity that made the substantial deposit of 11,200 ETH to the leading cryptocurrency exchange in the past few hours. The deposit comes […]

The post Breaking: ETH Drops to a Key Support; Triggers 11.2K Transfer to Binance appeared first on Coin Edition.
